examples.example: 我已经准备好迎接新的挑战，让自己不断进步。

translate.english: I'm already ready to meet new challenges and let myself make continuous progress.

examples.example: 我时刻准备着为实现自己的梦想而努力奋斗。

translate.english: I am always ready to strive hard to realize my dream.

examples.example: 我一直在积极准备，迎接未来生活的各种美好。

translate.english: I have been actively preparing to welcome all kinds of beauties of future life.
